Text: As promised  on my earlier video here is  the copy of SN Brussels Airlines. Now  that WAR  has  sold  it out its better to  upload  the  copy  for  everyone  else  who  never  got a  chance  to this  wonderful one.
This has been one of  my favorite WAR productions of all time. Unusual routes and procedures are followed in this release.
Thank you for this upload.  This looks like another great DVD from WAR, and you're right, some very interesting destinations.  Thanks again :)
Thankyou for your valuable comments 'Raider1500' Anyways  these days PILOTSEYE.tv releases seems to be more attractive due to their high quality footage. :)
